title: How to Watch ABC on Roku

steps.title: Open your Roku device or TV.
steps.content: Open your Roku device or TV. Roku will open up to your Home feed and main menu.

steps.title: Select Streaming Channels on the left.
steps.content: Select Streaming Channels on the left. You can use your Roku remote to navigate the menu. This will open the Channel Store page. You can add new channels to your Roku here.

steps.title: Select Search Channels on the left.
steps.content: Select Search Channels on the left. You can enter a keyword to search a channel here.

steps.title: Type ABC into the channel search.
steps.content: Type ABC into the channel search. Use the virtual keyboard on the search screen to search ABC. Matching results will show up on the right.

steps.title: Select the ABC channel you want to add in the search results.
steps.content: Select the ABC channel you want to add in the search results. ABC has multiple channels available on the Roku store, including WATCH ABC and WATCH ABC Family . Selecting the channel will open its details.

steps.title: Select the Add channel option on the details page.
steps.content: Select the Add channel option on the details page. This will add the selected ABC channel to your Home page. If you have a PIN, you'll be prompted to enter it here.

steps.title: Select OK in the confirmation box.
steps.content: Select OK in the confirmation box. You'll see a pop-up notification when the channel is added to your Home screen. This will close the pop-up.

steps.title: Select the Go to channel option next to the channel.
steps.content: Select the Go to channel option next to the channel. This will take you to your ABC channel. You can also open the channel anytime from your Home screen.
